'''Anthony Gervase Mathew''' ([[14 March]] [[1905]] – [[4 April]] [[1976]]) was a fellow [[Inklings|Inkling]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. He was a Dominican priest and lecturer in Byzantine studies at the [[University of Oxford]].

In late [[1949]] he introduced editor [[Milton Waldman]] to Tolkien.

==Bibliography, selected==
*[[1947]]: ''[[Essays Presented to Charles Williams]]'', pp. 128–135
**"Marriage and ''Amour Courtois'' in Late-Fourteenth-Century England"
